title: 10 Things You Didn’t Know About 'The Passion of the Christ'
content: “The Passion of the Christ” was released in 2004, and made a great impact on the Christian community, and the world, for those who went to see it. Even though this depiction was graphic (parental discretion advised), it still failed to capture the full reality of what Jesus endured during his final hours on earth, but it came as remarkable close as we would expect a movie to.

title: The movie "God's Not Dead" won the GMA Dove Awards
content: The movie "God's Not Dead" is about a freshman college student named Josh Wheaton (Shane Harper), who enrolled in a philosophy class taught by a notorious and domineering professor...

title: When Hollywood made movies about Christianity
content: 'Heaven is for Real' debuted with a box office take of $21.5 million over the Easter weekend in US and Canadian theaters. 'Heaven is for Real' is the fourth faith-based movie that's opened already this year.
